Class HashTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • HashTable
  • public class HashTable
extends Object
    Class HashTable.
    Version:
    14/01/2021 This class implement a Hash Table with Hash functions using MurmurHash class. To use the program please put all of the files (including the text files) in the same directory. ENJOY!
    Author:
    Ofir Rozanes

      static void hashChecker​(int[] hashArr, int[] arrM, String str)
      hashChecker this function check if a string is in the hash table.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HashTable

        public HashTable()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(String[] args)
        The main function. running all the sub-methods to build and check the Hash-Table. runs on O(k(n+l)+m) time complexity (Theta is more accurate). m for build and set the table array to 0, O(kn) to fill the table, O(kl) to search in the table.

      • hashCreator

        public static void hashCreator​(int[] hashArr,
                               int[] arrM,
                               String str)
        hashCreator this function build and fill the hash table.
        Parameters:
        hashArr - the "k" different hash functions.
        arrM - to fill the table array.
        str - the string to encrypt.

      • hashChecker

        public static void hashChecker​(int[] hashArr,
                               int[] arrM,
                               String str)
        hashChecker this function check if a string is in the hash table.
        Parameters:
        hashArr - the "k" different hash functions.
        arrM - to check the table array.
        str - the string to check.
